overview: During her quarantine, the director was invited to make a film about her experience of confinement. To face this challenge, she extracts images from her memory -and archive-, to remind herself where to move to. "How to film flowers" is a personal essay film where artistic creation and personal expression become the means to think and process life. The result is an essay film about cinema and life as a creative act.
title: Cómo filmar a las flores
